translation: Vow of Samantabhadra Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 天台　智者大師　撰
translation: Tendai: Zhizhe dashi

source_sentence: 稽首十方三世一切諸佛。
translation: "He bows his head to all the buddhas of the ten directions and three times.
May he realize that certain person.

source_sentence: 諸佛所有一切波羅蜜行。
translation: 'All the buddhas' perfections.'
Now, I will certainly train like one of them.

source_sentence: 唯願諸佛如來慈悲哀念。
translation: Please pray that the buddha-tathāgatas will have compassion and sympathy for me.

source_sentence: 我願於菩提心得大固力。
translation: I wish that I could attain great stability in the mind of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 於不可思議諸佛法中得深信力。
translation: Among the unfathomable buddha-teachings, I'll attain the power of conviction.
Among the well-versed, I'll attain the power of not forgetting.

source_sentence: 於往來生死中得無疲倦力。
translation: In past birth and death, I'll attain the power of not being weary.

source_sentence: 於諸眾生中得堅大悲力。
translation: to attain the power of resolute great compassion among sentient beings ...
In generosity, he attains the power of resolute equanimity ...
in observing precepts, he attains the power of indestructibility ...
In tolerating humiliation, he attains the power of resolute acceptance.
The power of wisdom attained by insisting that Māra can't destroy him.
He attains the power of faith and happiness in the profound Dharma.
One.
"May I be in all places of birth.
In all things, I'll always be able to make offerings to all the buddhas in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 常得供養十方一切諸佛。
translation: I'll always be able to make offerings to all the buddhas in the ten directions.
There'll be no rest for as long as the future holds.
Two.

source_sentence: 願我受持如來甚深法海。
translation: May I accept the Tathāgata's profound ocean of teachings.
I'll immediately understand it for myself without relying on wisdom.
There'll be no rest for as long as the future holds.
Three.
Where the buddhas sit on the site of enlightenment.
May I be the highest leader in gathering the Dharma there.
I'd like to turn the wheel of the Dharma and liberate sentient beings.
There'll be no rest for as long as the future holds.
Four.

source_sentence: 願我修行一切諸菩薩無邊廣大願。
translation: May I cultivate the limitless and vast vows of all the bodhisattvas.
As long as it lasts, there won't be any rest.
Five.
May I teach and transform all sentient beings.
Egg-born, womb-born, wet-born, and transformation-born.
They'll all enter nirvāṇa without remainder.
There'll be no rest for as long as the future holds.
Sixth.

source_sentence: 願我生諸佛剎如對目前。
translation: May I be born in all the buddha-blocs as if I were facing the present.
There'll be no rest for as long as the future holds.
Seventh.

source_sentence: 願我嚴淨諸佛如來甚深剎海。
translation: May I adorn and purify the profound oceans of the buddha-tathāgatas' bases.
As long as it lasts, there'll be no rest.
Eight.

source_sentence: 願我與一切諸菩薩同行。
translation: May I walk with all the bodhisattvas.
Gathering all the good roots.
As long as it lasts, there'll be no rest.
Nine.
May all my physical, verbal, and mental actions be beneficial to sentient beings who see and hear them.
May all sentient beings who see and hear them obtain benefit.
Like the king of medicinal trees, there's nothing empty or superfluous about them.
There'll be no rest for as long as the future holds.
Ten.

source_sentence: 願我於一切微塵道中成等正覺。
translation: May I become equally enlightened among all the subtle paths.
Turn the great wheel of the Dharma.
I'll liberate all sentient beings.
There'll be no rest for as long as the future holds.

source_sentence: 佛子若能發此十大願者。
translation: If the Buddha-son can give rise to these ten great vows.

source_sentence: 百萬阿僧祗願門皆悉見發。
translation: A million incalculable vows will all be seen and arisen.
May this be your great vow.
Plant various good roots.
May it be transferred to all sentient beings.
May they all be permanently freed from the suffering of the three bad destinies.
Complete the vow of the Bodhisattva practice of Samantabhadra.

source_sentence: 我又以此善根迴向無上菩提。
translation: With these good roots, I'll also dedicate them to unsurpassed bodhi.
I don't seek the results of the two worldly vehicles.

source_sentence: 我又以此善根迴向真如法界海。
translation: With these good roots, I also direct them back to the ocean of the true reality as the Dharma realm.
That true nature has no cessation.
It's uncontaminated, uncontaminated, and uncontaminated by activity.
It's indestructible.
May my good roots likewise be directed.
As the buddhas of the three times direct their attention, so I will direct mine.
I'll likewise dedicate myself in this way.
After dedicating myself to the Three Treasures, I return to my life and worship them.
